title: Dungeon Map
desc:
Use this to end the game as a victory and gain +5000 points.

Simply obtaining this item is not a guarantee of victory. You have to actually use it to gain the bonus. You can continue fighting onwards, but the monsters will scale indefinitely as you go deeper.
_ _
**Not all monsters can be escaped!** If you die, it won't matter that you had this map in your inventory. Your run won't count as a victory, and you won't gain the 5000 point bonus.
